She is happy to hear this and asked you about…..
112321122.title: A thin girl with glasses

1123212.content:
"Excellent choice!" says Rosa with a smile. "I'm sure you'll be very happy. Now, hold still; this won't hurt a bit."

----------------

You don't actually remember passing out again, but you must have, because the next thing you know you're opening your eyes again, in another unfamiliar place— you're lying on a couch in an unfamiliar room. As your vision clears, you see a middle-aged man looking at you from behind a desk.

"Ah, Miss Jensen, finally you awake." says the man.

As you sit up, you feel strange -smaller, lighter. You can feel your hair on your neck and back, and you feel a light but noticeable weight on your chest. "What happened? Who are you?" you groan, only to let out an "eep" at the unfamiliar -female- sound of your voice.

"Don't you know, Miss Jensen?" he responds. "I'm Mr. Stanton, your professor."

Still a little disoriented, you say "I'm sorry sir, but I think you have me confused for someone else. I'm Elliot Barnes."

"Is that so?" he asks calmly. He pulls you to your feet and directs you to look at a mirror on the back of the office door.

You look in the mirror and are shocked by what you see. The reflection staring back at you is of a decently pretty girl in her late teens, with waist-length straight black hair, wearing a modest blue-gray shirt and jeans, and a small pair of thin, simple glasses. You raise your arm, and the reflection mirrors your movement. Looking down at yourself only confirms that the girl in the reflection is you. You realize...Janet Jensen. They actually turned you into Janet Jensen.
1123212.title: Nod to Janet Jensen

11232121.content:
No. No, this can't be right. You stumble back, confused and fearful. "No, this can't be..." you ramble in shock, "I'm not... I…" You spin around to look at Mr. Stanton, who is standing quietly by his desk. "What's going on, what happened?" you demand fearfully.

Mr. Stanton clasps his hands behind his back. "Based on your answers to the placement exam, you were given a position to best fit your personality and interests. I realize it can be a bit of a shock, but this really is the best fit for you, Janet."

You wince at the name, but continue your protest, "But I don't want... I can't be a girl!"

"You'll adapt," Mr. Stanton says firmly. "You are Janet Jensen, my teaching assistant. Do you understand?"
11232121.title: Panic

112321211.content:
You take a deep breath to calm and steady yourself. It seems you have little choice. "Yes, I understand," you say, barely keeping your voice steady.

Mr. Stanton's tone and expression lighten immediately. "Good," he says happily. "Now, you're my teaching assistant but classes don't begin until Monday. You have until then to adjust and familiarize yourself with the campus." He slides a couple items across his desk to you. "Here, these are yours."

You go over and see he passed you a wallet containing ID, some cash and a credit/debit card, along with a plain black smartphone and a campus map. You put the phone in one pocket and the wallet in the other, and look at the map. "Everything else you need is in your dorm room," Mr. Stanton says. "The dorm and room number are on your campus ID, which is also your dorm and room key." He then walks you out of the room. "You should be able to handle things from here, Miss Jensen. I look forward to seeing you in class." And he shuts his office door, leaving you alone in the hallway.
112321211.title: "Yes"

choices: Try to find a way out
1123212111.content:
You groan. This is not what you were expecting. You take off your glasses to rub the exasperation and exhaustion from your eyes, then put them back on since your vision is rather poor without them. You pull out the wallet and ID (still not comfortable with the ID saying 'Janet Jensen' but able to suppress it) and find your dorm location on the map, deciding to head there first.

You go outside and see a sign identifying this building as 'Professors' Offices'. You find it on the map and mentally trace a path to your dorm, about halfway across campus. Only then do you look out at the actual campus, and are surprised by what you see. It's large, and very modern-looking but still keeping lush greenery for a good aesthetic look. You don't like what they've done to you but you have to admit it is impressive.

As you make your way to your dorm you think about the change in your identity. It could definitely be worse, but that doesn't mean you like it. You catch a glimpse of your reflection in a mirrored surface serving as part of a modern art sculpture, and stop briefly to take it in again. Though there's no mistaking that you're a girl, your appearance isn't too feminine: you're wearing pants instead of a skirt and sneakers instead of heels, you don't have a purse or handbag, you're not wearing jewelry, makeup, or cosmetics of any kind (and you still look decent), and although your hair is long it just falls where it will and has no fancy treatments. Before you were too focused on having been turned into a girl to notice all this, but now... You take a deep breath to steady yourself and continue toward the dorm. You're still uncomfortable with the change, and you still don't like it, but if Janet isn't too feminine... Yes, it could be a lot worse.

You reach your dorm, which has an electronic lock. Just as Mr. Stanton said, scanning your ID gets you access. You then find your room and scan your ID to get in. And...

The room is neat and meticulously organized. On the far wall there is a desk with an advanced-looking computer on one side and open work space on the other. On the right wall is the bed, neatly made with gray sheets. On the left wall is the closet door and a bookshelf of science-fiction novels. On the near wall (with the door you entered through) is another bookshelf containing textbooks, folders and binders, and various non-fiction books (including manuals and documentations) about robotics engineering and computer sciences. Checking the closet reveals that Janet's outfits are mostly similar to what you're wearing now: modest shirts and pants in gender-neutral colors. The clothing/underwear dresser is in the closet as well, being small enough to fit, and containing only simple white bras, panties, and socks.

You sigh. It seems Janet is a modest, intelligent, tomboyish engineering student. You're still not enthusiastic about being her, but you repeat to yourself again that it could be a lot worse. The question arises, though, what do you do now?
1123212111.title: Find your dorm room

choices: One of the buildings since you've got all weekend to meet people.
1123212112.content:
Still a bit bewildered, you wander down the hallway towards a set of double doors. Through the windows, sunshine illuminates the trees and buildings beyond, and you walk outside stopping at the top of the steps and survey the campus.

The walk ahead leads to a large statue with arms spread as if welcoming you. Walkways lead from it to other buildings left, right and beyond. There's a few people wandering along.

To the left is a modernistic, mostly glass structure that looks like something out of the future. The sun glints off parts of it while other parts seem to absorb all light leaving deep black holes that reveal nothing no matter how hard you stare.

Behind the statue is a wooden building of three floors, the top being dormers in the roof. It's painted in an off-white with deep blue shutters on one side and dark red shutters framing the windows on the other. A small covered porch holds several chairs and benches with various colored cushions.

On your right looms a large red brick building with the sun behind it. In the shadows, ivy surrounds the windows like eyelids of a multi-eyed monster with the high archway in the center like an open mouth swallowing students then spitting out others.

Looking down at the map, you see the glass building is the science building. Ahead is the co-ed dorm with obvious male and female wings. On the right are classrooms and library. Behind you - the building you just met Mr. Stanton - is the administration and teacher offices along with some meeting rooms.

The statue before you is listed as the "Alfred King Statue." As you raise your eyes, the statue seems now to beckon you forward. You blink slowly thinking it must be an illusion of the sun; and when you open your eyes this time, it's arms are now spread again.

It's all quite weird, although also somewhat familiar. As you move down the steps, the wind catches your hair and blows strands across your face which you casually brush back behind an ear as natural as can be. It isn't until you're just about to the statue that you realize that you're wearing high heeled shoes but have not faltered one bit, even down the steps, and they feel natural as does the slight bouncing of your chest. Well, at least if you're now a girl, you're not fumbling about acting like a guy trying to act like a girl.

There's a stocky girl with strawberry hair looking up at the statue on one side, but your attention is drawn to a tall, well built, and handsome young man looking at you from behind the statue. A feeling of being alone not knowing anyone wafts over you, and you think this experience would definitely go better if you made some friends.

You've always been uncomfortable meeting girls and aren't sure how to approach her. She seems more interested in the statue than any of the people around, but maybe she's just as lonely as you are. You see the guy is also checking her out possibly trying to decide which of the two of you to approach.

Suddenly, you feel like you've got a little competition going here. Perhaps you should approach the girl before he does just to tease him and cut him off. Or maybe you should just put yourself before him before he goes for her making a decision for him. Excitement washes over you as you move towards ...
1123212112.title: Explore the campus

choices: You and Kelly explore the campus
11232121121.content:
The guy glances between you and the other girl. You don't like the way he's looking at you - he's obviously and blatantly checking you out, and it feels creepy and uncomfortable. You briefly consider confronting him, but dismiss it - you (as Janet) are pretty small, and even the heels add only an inch (at most) of height - you don't think confronting him would go well for you. So you find yourself approaching the girl.

Hearing you approach, she looks over to you. "Hey," she says in a quiet, even tone. "Who are you?"

You look at her more closely. Like you, she's dressed modestly and plainly, and like you, she's not wearing any cosmetics or jewelry. "I'm...Janet," you say, stumbling a bit on your new name. "I'm new here."

She nods. "So am I," she says, "My name's Kelly." She glances back to the statue, then back to you.

"Um... Am I interrupting anything?" you ask hesitantly.

"No, no..." Kelly says, "I just...saw an optical illusion with this statue and I was curious about it."

You're surprised to hear her mention the illusion with the statue. "I saw something too," you say. "A minute ago it looked like it changed position for a second."

Kelly nods. "Yeah. But I suppose it doesn't matter. If they could do this," she gestures at herself and you understand she's referring to your new bodies, "they could easily set up an illusion here." She shrugs, then turns away, gesturing for you to follow, which you do. "I should get going. I want to look around," she lowers her voice, "and get away from that guy," she briefly indicates the boy, who's still there. "He's just been staring at us. It's annoying." You agree with this completely, so you go along with Kelly. She smiles, seemingly pleased to have you with her.

As you leave the statue behind, Kelly looks at you. "Have you seen your dorm room yet, Janet?" she asks. "I woke up in mine. They're pretty nice, actually."

"No, I haven't," you confess. "I only woke up a few minutes ago, in that building there," you say, indicating the professor's offices. You idly think that it's easier talking to girls since you've become one yourself - you don't think your normal self would be as relaxed around Kelly as you are.

"In there?" Kelly asks, "What's your position?"

"I'm an...engineering major teacher's assistant," you say, adjusting your glasses.

"Cool," says Kelly, "I'm a major in biology, nothing too special about me. Anyway, do you want to check out your room first?"

"I considered that," you say, "but I wanted to look around the campus first. I'm...getting used to..." you gesture at yourself, referring to your new body, and Kelly nods.
11232121121.title: The girl

11232121122.content:
The guy is clearly checking you out, and it feels creepy and uncomfortable. Hoping to get him to stop, you approach him. Seeing you approach, he smiles and walks toward you. He's significantly taller than you - as Janet you're pretty small, and even the heels add only about an inch of height at most - so he's looking down at you. Except he's not looking at your face - he's clearly staring at your chest. You use the standard response: you say "Hey! My face is up here."

He looks at your face and grins. "Hey babe," he says in a tone that's probably supposed to sound suave but only sounds sleazy. "I'm Richard. You want me to show you a good time?"

You shudder, disturbed by the blatant pervertedness, and simultaneously wonder why - you'd seen your reflection, and you're cute and pretty, but not 'hot' or 'sexy', and you're dressed modestly to boot, with no cosmetics or jewelry. You decide he's just an idiot. "Certainly not the kind you're thinking of," you say, then as his gaze slips down to your chest again you cross your arms to block his view of your breasts. "And my name is Janet." You stumble a bit on your new name, but manage to be firm anyway.

"Come on, don’t be like that," he says, his tone actually sounding whiny. You roll your eyes, he's clearly an idiot. He's likely meant to be either a frat boy or dumb jock type, which you weren't that fond of even when you were a boy, and find that you like even less now that you're a girl.

"I said no," you say firmly. "Not interested. And I don't appreciate you perving on me like this." You turn away. "If you have something intelligent to say, and can say it without ogling me, go ahead." He remains silent, so you leave.
11232121122.title: The boy

11232122.content:
"Okay," you say, trying to remain calm at the sight of the bland looking girl that is now you, "Can you just explain what happened to me?"

"Well, Janet," he says, causing you to cringe at your new name, "You've been given a new life based on your interests. Janet is the perfect body for you!"

"But I don't want to be a girl!" you protest. He shushes you. "You'll get used to it, Janet. Now, you're a teaching assistant. It's time for you to get to work."

"Where do I work now?" you ask timidly.
11232122.title: Try to remain calm

112322.content:
“That's it!” says Rosa with a smile as you finish the final question.

“What, really?” you ask, startled. “I thought there would be more questions...”

“Our dynamic placement tests are very efficient,” says Rosa. “Just give me a moment to calculate your score.”

With another smile, Rosa takes your exam and sashays over to her desk, where she begins entering something into her computer. After a few minutes, she comes back, still smiling.

“Congratulations!” she says. “Using our placement algorithm, we've found the perfect place for you! When you wake up, I'm sure you'll agree!”

“What do you mean when I wake—“

Suddenly, you start as a sharp jab pierces the skin of your neck.

“...up?” you finish, voice slurring as you crumple to the floor.

-------------------

When you awake, you find yourself suspended inside a tall glass tube, like something out of a 1950's alien abduction movie. Outside the tube is Rosa, smiling at you through the glass.

“Excellent,” she says happily, “You're awake. Now we can begin the final acclimation process! This is the best part; where you get to choose your new body!”

“My new what!?” You scream. “What the hell are you talking about!? You drugged me!”


“I'm sorry,” she says with a smile. “I'm afraid I can't hear you through the glass. I know you must be excited; just be patient a little longer, this is the last step.”

You continue screaming, to no avail. Rosa simply turns away with a wave and begins fiddling with a computer console.

“Now, down to business. Congratulations; your placement test indicates you'll be of greatest value to the university community as a member of the honors program! They're a wonderful bunch; I'm sure you'll have no trouble at all making friends!”

Rose brings up a monitor mounted on a swivel, pulling it in front of your tube.

“Now,” she says with a smile, “We still have two honors student's profiles still unfilled; either would be a good match for your responses. I'll let you decide which one you'd prefer.”

She brings up two profiles on the monitor, then looks at you, smiling.

Kate Wilson
Age: 18
Hair: Red
Height: 5'7”
Weight: 110 lbs
Ethnicity: White Non-Hispanic
Measurements: 32B-24-30
Major: Biology

Kim Chang
Age: 18
Hair: Black
Height: 5'3”
Weight: 102 lbs
Ethnicity: Asian (Chinese)
Measurements: 30A-22-28
Major: Physics


"Now, just nod toward the one you'd prefer and we can get started."

You try to protest, but Rosa simply smiles.

"No; I can't hear you. Just nod at the profile you prefer."

choices: "Elliot Barnes! I'm a man, not a girl!"
1123221.content:
A moment after you nod at the profile of Kate Wilson, you black out.

When you awake, you're lying on a couch in unfamiliar room. As you sit up, you feel strange -smaller, lighter. You can feel your hair on your neck and back, and you feel a slight weight on your chest. "What happened?" you groan, only to let out an "eep" at the unfamiliar -female- sound of your voice.

"Oh! You're awake!" says another female voice, and you look to see that the speaker is a girl with shoulder-length brunette hair. She comes over and helps you stand.

"Huh?" you ask, "What do you mean? What's going on?" Your unfamiliar female voice sounds strange to you, and you wince slightly.

The brunette smiles gently and leads you over to a full-length mirror on the wall. As your confusion clears, she says "I know; it's a shock when you're first placed, isn't it? Here, have a look."

You look in the mirror and are shocked by what you see: a decently-pretty girl with long straight red hair, wearing a pale green shirt and girl's slacks. You raise your hand, and the reflection mirrors your movement. The girl in the mirror...is you. You realize... Kate Wilson. They actually turned you into Kate Wilson.

"I'm Crystal; I'm an honors student, like you. I'll be helping you get acclimated over the next couple days. And you are...?"
1123221.title: Nod to Kate Wilson

choices: Run off and try to find a way out.
11232211.content:
"Good," says Crystal, "I'm glad you understand. Just so you know, talking or dwelling on 'Before' is forbidden, but as long as you accept who you are now, you're pretty much free to do as you like." She smiles and extends her hand, which you shake warily. "I'm glad you understand," she repeats.

"As I said, I'll be helping you get acclimated over the next couple days. There's still a little over a week before the semester starts; plenty of time to get used to this." Crystal turns as if to walk off, gesturing for you to follow. "I'd suggest we start by showing you around; you're going to be an honors student, you have to be ready."

The question arises: what should you do? Do you go along with Crystal, or do you run off and try to find a way out of this crazy place?

1123311.content:
"Excellent choice!" says Rosa with a smile. "I'm sure you'll be very happy. Now, hold still; this won't hurt a bit."

----------------

The next thing you know, you're waking up again. Your body feels strange, and there's an unfamiliar weight on your chest. As your vision clears, you see you're lying on your back on a bed in an unfamiliar room.

"Are you awake?" asks a female voice. You turn to see a girl with short dirty-blonde hair sitting in a chair by a desk.

"What? Who are you?" you ask, your voice sounding soft and high-pitched.

The girl looks at you. "I'm Jennifer Blaine. A fellow R.A. And you are?"

"Huh?" you ask. "I'm... Elliot Barnes."

"Are you sure about that?" Jennifer asks, taking your hand and pulling you to your feet. As she does, you get a look at the room. It looks like a college dorm room - a single. You were lying on the bed, which has light green sheets. There's a desk with a computer, where Jennifer was sitting, and a bookshelf filled with books. There's posters on the walls from several science fiction series. Jennifer turns you to a door that has a full-length mirror on it, and you stare in shock.

Looking back at you from the mirror is an attractive-looking brunette girl. She's slim but also curvy, with large breasts. She's wearing sneakers, an ankle-length light green flowing skirt, and a modest black shirt that manages to cover her large chest but cannot hide it. Her face is soft and cute, with blue eyes. Her hair is soft brown and reaches her waist. You lift your hand, and the reflection mirrors the movement. You gently tug on your hair, and you can feel it. You gently poke your large bust, but drop your hand as you feel that too. The girl in the mirror is you. You realize... Rebecca Reeve. They actually turned you into Rebecca Reeve.

"Now let's try this again. Who are you?" says Jennifer pointedly. Something about her tone hints that she's not genuinely asking.
1123311.title: Nod to Rebecca.

11233111.content:
"Good," Jennifer says, smiling. "I know being placed is a shock, but you are who you are now. You and I are the two R.A.s for Yates Hall's 3rd floor. This is your dorm room - you're in charge of the east side. As you're a new appointment, you'll be getting training for the position before the semester starts. Before that, though, you'll be given time to acclimate and learn the campus. I'll be helping you with that."

"Uh, thanks..." you say.

Jennifer smiles. "Okay, you probably want to look around your room. I'll wait outside. When you're ready, come on out and I can show you around the campus." And with that, she steps outside, leaving you alone.

As suggested, you look around. The room is neat and organized, the decor in shades of green, blue, and white. The computer on the desk looks advanced and fancy, and the desk is large enough to also have a space for handwritten work. Under the desk is a printer with a built-in scanner. The bookshelf contains your textbooks - various books on writing and literature. There are also several classic novels. The bottom shelf contains some science-fiction books, probably for personal entertainment. There's a small dresser, which is filled with undergarments - standard socks, panties, and bras - as well as pajamas (nightgowns, mostly, but also shirts and pants). You check the closet - the door with the mirror - and find a large number of modest shirts, and skirts varying from knee-length to ankle-length, and only a couple pairs of pants. There's one spare pair of shoes in there - a pair of formal flats. You shut the closet door, shaking your head in resignation.

You exit the dorm room to find Jennifer waiting in the hall. "Ready to see the campus?" she asks.
11233111.title: "Uh, Rebecca, I guess. Rebecca Reeve."

1123321.content:
A moment after you nod at the profile of Alexis Lee, you black out.

When you awake, you're lying face down on an unfamiliar bed. Breathing becomes more labored than what you are used to when you lay on your stomach. There is an unfamiliar pressure against your chest that somehow feels oversized and incredibly sensitive. Your eyes shoot open as you jerk your head up from the pillow it was resting on. Your vision is blurred but you can tell you are in a room you've never been in before. The other thing you notice is how several long strands of fine, black hair fell over your opened eye to obscure your vision further. Memories of the conversation with Rosa slowly come back. She was talking about some profile that you were supposed to choose between. One was Alexis Lee and the other was Amanda Rodriguez. You chose Alexis because you loved history but also because she sounded hot. Who doesn't love volleyball chicks after all? But never in your wildest dreams did you actually believe it would become reality.

'Okay, stay calm,' You think to yourself as you lay as still as possible. 'There is no way this could possibly be happening. I'm probably just laying on a large pillow or two.' Slowly, you slide your left hand to your chest to inspect the object under your chest. You lament as your fingers caress soft flesh covered by a cloth connected to your shirt. 'This has got to be a dream...'

"Hey, you awake?" Came an unfamiliar female voice from behind you. Your eyes shoot open once more as you naturally turn your head to the source of the disturbance. It was a tall blonde who was sitting on her bed reading a rather large book, at least, she looked like she had been. By this point the book was lowered and she turned her head to face you. "About time you woke up." She said with a smile as she completely set her book aside. "Where am I?" You ask and are so shocked at the voice coming out of your mouth that you let out an "eep". The voice was sultry and sweet, the voice of a true siren with just the slightest hint of an accent.

"This is Smith Annex," The blonde girl says as she stands up. "My name is Maria. I know, being placed is a shock, isn't it?" She takes your silent shock as a yes. "Have a look for yourself." Maria leads your gaze over to a full length mirror. You hesitate in your bed for a moment, horrified at what might await you inside that mirror. Against your better judgement, you muster up the courage to face your fate.

Long, toned legs reach out to the floor easily. You don't pay much attention to this fact until you stand up fully extended. The ceiling and surrounding furniture was smaller than what you remember it. Even Maria, your Hispanic roommate appears to be on the small side when moments ago you thought she was rather tall for a girl. The fact that your center of gravity has shifted tremendously is also very evident to you as you walk towards the mirror.

The first thing that catches your attention is your eyes. They are a brilliant jade and so captivating that you were mesmerized by your own gaze. Next came your face with its flawless, porcelain skin and luscious lips. Your facial features were sleek with your distinctly Asian heritage but softened by your Western lineage for breathtaking beauty. Gradually you survey the rest of 'your body'. Silk-like black hair fell just below your waist, you could tell by turning around to see. That was when you noticed your shapely rear even in the grey sweatpants you were wearing. The waist itself was pulled up and folded over in that way girls do when wearing incredibly comfortable boys clothing. Jade eyes followed the skinny waistline of the sweatpants back to the front when your vision was obscured by two large, firm breasts. You could feel your cheeks starting to get hot from embarrassment as you realized that there were two very stiff protrusions peaking out from underneath the white tank top doing its beast to keep you modest. You avert your eyes to keep you from getting more embarrassed by looking at yourself in the mirror again. Exposed navel greeted your eyes this time. Firm, six pack abs that were softened by a thin layer of body fat to keep it feminine looking. 'God, everything about this girl is hot!'

"Crazy, isn't it?" Maria said, tearing your eyes away from the mirror that you became infatuated with. You glance over at Maria to find her leaning against the wall with her arms crossed. "Waking up in some other girl's body." You stare at her blankly for a moment. "Other girl's..?" Maria nodded at your statement. "One minute you are enjoying a girl's chat with Rosa and the next minute you wake up in some other girl's body." That was when you realized that Maria must have been a girl put in another girl's body. Would she find it weird that you swapped from one to another? Maybe she'd think you were a pervert. You decided it would be best not to tell her. "Yeah, really weird..."

Maria gave you a gentle smile before walking next to you. "Well don't worry about it too much. You've got me to help acclimate you." She placed a hand on your shoulder, looking up to you. "I'm an honors student like you and on your volleyball team. Though it looks like you'll be our star player!" You respond with a weak smile because you don't quite have this whole situation figured out. Maria removes her hand and places both of her hands on her hips in a sassy manner. "So does our star player have a name?"
1123321.title: Alexis Lee

choices: Put on the uniform and continue with your tour
Ask Maria to help you figure out what outfits you should wear with your new body
11233211.content:
"I'm Alexis, Alexis Lee." You say to Maria. That was the name you were given by Rosa at least. You couldn't help but feel a little unsettled using this name for the first time. A whole new name to fit a whole new body for a whole new identity. The thought rattled you to the core. Was this process reversible or were you stuck as Alexis forever?"

"Alexis?" Maria replied to your name with a hint of jealousy. "Aw, that means you get the cute nickname Lexi!" She was visibly pouting at this point. You had never thought of that. Lexi was a great nickname now that you thought about it. Sophisticated yet sassy. A smile you couldn't suppress comes across you face. "Well you should have chosen better, shouldn't you?" You say as instinctively move to cross your arms across your chest but quickly realize adjust your arms to be crossed underneath your large chest, lest you try and crush them to keep them folded. That was going to be a strange habit to get into. Fortunately Maria didn't notice your awkwardness because her mouth was open in shock at what you said.

"You bitch!" Maria said to you playfully as she smacked your butt that caused you to let out a yelp before moving past you. "Now get dressed so I can show you a tour of campus." Maria walked over to a closet next to her bed, taking her shirt off while she walked. Your eyes follow her as she walks into her closet to get changed herself.

'Wait, get dressed?!' You think to yourself. What did you know about female fashion? All you really knew is what you liked seeing them in; revealing clothing. Unless slutastic was fashionable here, which you weren't even sure you could pull off, you had no idea what you were going to do. 'Its okay, maybe it'll come to me when I open the closet.' You open the closet and the first thing you see in front of you was a rack of all white blouses. Just below the blouses were a number of plaid skirts whose primary color was emerald green with the off color appearing to be a really dark color of blue, really dark. Perhaps they were navy blue? On either side of this rack was an assortment of matching apparel that. To the left were navy blue blazers with an emblem on the chest that must be the school coat of arms. To the right were several long sleeve sweaters, a few sweater vests, and ties.

"Well that makes things easy..." You mutter to yourself when you hear Maria say. "I know, right?" She walks up behind you wearing her white blouse and was halfway done working on her tie. "These uniforms are dreadful, but at least we get weekends to wear whatever we want." That was when Maria pointed to the left and right sides of the closet where your 'casual clothes' were located. "Though switching to a new body makes picking your attire a challenge at first. I mean, going from knowing whether or not you've got a big ass make a world of difference in the entire ensemble!"
11233211.title: "I'm Alexis, Alexis Lee."

112332112.content:
"No kidding..." You say as you survey your body once more. "You know what? Now might be the perfect time to find out!" You say as you look over to Maria with a smile as she finished tying her tie. "Care to play a little dress up?" You raise a questioning eyebrow as you give your roommate a playful smile. She glances down at her watch before gazing back up at you. "Oh you are such a bad influence on me!"

Maria looked your body up and down before turning her gaze towards the closet. Next thing you knew, she darted inside your closet and pulled out three different tops. "Which one of these do you like?" She asks as she holds up a red, low cut v-neck, one of those frilly tops that girls wear over tops that makes them look pregnant, and a teal tube top. You imagine yourself in these clothes and how sexy you'd look wearing them. That was when a dreadful thought crept into your mind. How many other guys would be staring at you creepily while you wore them? That was something you did not want to even be aware of, let alone deal with. Maybe the pregnant top wasn't such a bad idea after all. "Or you could always go with the one piece black dress." Maria said, sensing your uneasiness at the choices before you. You look over to the one piece dress and your eyes immediately lighten up. The black dress was sleek, stylish, and conservative. Maria could see the look of approval on your face. "I bet you're a tease, aren't you?" She joked as she threw down the tops she picked out. "Well don't just stand there, try it on!" She exclaimed as she dove into the closet to find clothing of similar tastes.

You shrug and pull your tank top over your head and throw it to the ground with the rest of the tops. The sweatpants quickly follow. Maria glanced over and saw you standing next to her in nothing but lacy boy shorts and did a double take. "Wow," She said as she stood up and placed on hand on her hip. "I must admit, I'm jealous. And its good to know my teammate has no problem exposing herself." You stick your tongue out at her as you throw the dress on over your head. The dress naturally became stuck on your chest and you hand to assist sliding it down the rest of your body. The dress was so tight that it was form fitting and you had a feeling it was mean to be this way. "Double wow!" Maria said as she looked you over. "Now go put on some nylons while I pick out your shoes!" She seemed to be having far more fun with this than you were.

After several minutes of searching you find a pair of black nylons and put your left foot through the nylon stocking. Slowly you draw the stocking up your leg. This is the first time you've examined your legs closely and it was thrilling. You had very long legs that were toned from years of playing sports (you assumed). The feel of your soft, smooth skin was tantalizing and even more exciting the second time through with your right leg. You can't help but believe you've got the most perfect set of legs you have ever seen.

"Ready?" Maria asked as she held up a pair of 3 inch heels. The shoes were primarily made of black straps that you wrapped around your feet once you put them on. You shake your head with a smile as you done your new footwear. If you thought you were tall at 6'2, you hardly imagined what life at 6'5 was going to be like. Though it was difficult to wear the shoes at first. You had to get used to walking in heels.
112332112.title: Ask Maria to help you figure out what outfits y...

1123321122.content:
"Now that is H-O-T-T, hot!" Your roommate Maria said as she licked her index finger to touch her ass that she stuck out for your viewing pleasure. She made a sizzling sound like water boiling on a hot frying pan. You can't help but grin at her remark. "Come on, I want to see the full package!" She said while twirling her finger around. You respond by doing a twirl for her. "Honey, you have nothing to worry about when it comes to fashion. If you can wear it, you can pull it off. Heck, you'd be able to pull off things you can't wear!"

That was when a high pitched beeping came from Maria's silver wristwatch. "Oh crap!" She exclaimed as she looked at her watch in disbelief. "Look at the time, we've gotta go!" The tiny, by your standards, Puerto Rican girl grabbed your wrist and pulled you with surprising strength. "Go, go where?!" You protest as you are pulled out of the room. "What about my uniform?!"

Being dragged out into the hallway, you catch a glimpse of a room door to your immediate left. On the door was what looked like computer paper inside of a plastic sheet protector with two names on it. You don't have time to read it because you are being pulled along by your roommate but you are fairly certain they were female names due to the pink ink and stars for dots you see on the paper. Directly in front of you was what looked like an open bathroom. There was a massive mirror on the one side with four sinks, tile floor, and shower stalls on the right hand side. Across from you was a similar door that was open as well. The door opened up to another door that also had a pair of names on it. You realize you are probably living in a quad, four rooms and a bathroom.

There was little time to dwell on that thought. Maria quickly pulled you to the right with ease and then to the left in an open hallway. She was directing you with ease because you were unbalanced by the heels you were unaccustomed to wearing. You decided it was best to follow instead of risking a catastrophic collision that would be mainly embarrassing. "Where are we going?" You pressed Maria again as she dragged you past several quads on either side of the hallway. "I've got to take you to see the academic councilor, its part of the acclimation process!" She responded as the hallway opened up into a lounge. There were numerous tables and comfy looking pieces of furniture laying around in no particular order. That lounge turned into a main lobby with a desk that was being staffed by two women who appeared to be in their early also girls wearing uniforms.

"Resident Advisers, students who live with us, settle disputes, and enforce the regs." Maria said as she walked up to a pair of glass doors with metal frames. The glass looked thick enough to be bulletproof and the doors had a large bolt lock that automatically unlocked when motion sensors detected Maria and you passing under them. Fortunately for Maria, unfortunately for people like you trying to keep up with her, the door could be pushed open from the inside (Though the weight of the door did seem to slow her down momentarily). "Real pain in the rear." Maria said cheekishly as soon as the door closed behind her with a wicked grin.

Glancing back you see the residential hall you are coming out of was about four stories high. It was built out of brick with a concrete foundation. The top of the building had a wooden roof that came to a point similar to architectural designs of colonial south. It even looked like it had a bell tower at the top. Meanwhile a wrought iron fence guided people down the steps from the main lobby.

'Steps?!'

It was by the grace of God and you leaning on your roommate that you didn't trip down the five concrete stairs and crack open your skull or killing your roommate. You had little time to recover as Maria shows her gratitude by guiding you to the far less imposing one story building. Inside the building was a computer bank, another common area for study or waiting, what looked like a receptionist window, and several offices. "Great, we made it!" Maria said as she finally lets go of your hand. "I've got to check in at the counter, your counselor's office is right there." She said as she pointed to a door before heading over to the counter.

Now that you have time to yourself to think you begin to worry as you approach the door. Who was your counselor and what were they going to tell you? Would the know who you are or what you are? What about you not being in uniform, will they be as bad or worse than what Maria said about the Residential Advisers?
1123321122.title: Uh-oh, time to go!

11233211221.content:
Taking a deep breath, you calm yourself and clear your thoughts. You place your hand on the silver doorknob to open it up. 'Here goes nothing...' You think to yourself as you twist the knob and pull the door open. You are shocked at what you see in front of you.

Sitting behind a rather large, wrap around desk made of oak was none other than Rosa typing on a computer. Your mouth drops open as you raise a accusation finger at the woman. "Y-You!" You exclaim in a higher pitched voice than you anticipated. The woman stops typing and looks up at you with a pleasant smile. "Ah, Alexis," She began to say as she stands up and gestures to a chair in front of her desk while heading towards a filing cabinet. "Please, have a seat."

You walk inside the office and close the door behind you. This was a conversation best left private you think as you walk to the chair that Rosa gestured to. "So how are things going so far?" The woman asks you excitedly as she pulls out a file from the cabinet and walked over to her desk. "Well its definitely been an experience, that is for sure." You say to Rosa in an uncertain voice while she takes a seat in her chair and begins looking over her file. "I bet it is, you are our first successful TG!" She replied gleefully, causing you to raise an eyebrow at her. "Successful, TG? Are you seriously telling me you've never done this before!" You practically shout at the woman who seems to be unphased by your reaction. "Oh heavens no, that would be irresponsible of us." Rosa laughed while putting your file down on the desk. "We've done it plenty of times. Yours is the first to be successful."

For a minute all you can do is sit back in shock at what Rosa is telling you. "We were able to make it work by adding hints of your DNA into the mix. That of course means there are some things that aren't exactly like we had planned with your body but that should be nothing to worry about." You knew this was going to be an experimental procedure but you never realized to what liberty they were going to take with your body up until this point. What if things had gone wrong, what if you died during the whole thing? "Among other things your body is producing a large amount of testosterone as well as estrogen. This normally causes problems but we've used our technology to block majority of the ill effects. Though I do suspect you'll have far better understand of geo-spatial relations than women due to this and more than likely will be far stronger than a woman of your size." You automatically give Rosa threatening look when she referenced your size, as if implying she shouldn't insult your figure. "And here I can see the estrogen taking its affect on your thought process. Your vocabulary should unexpectedly expand, as will your communication skills, concerns for others, and near sighted perception."

'Estrogen affecting my vocabulary and behavior. That explains the words slutastic and ensemble.'

"Great, so what does this all mean for me? Am I going to be stuck like this forever or am I going to have to try and go public with this information?" You threaten as you cross both of your arms and give Rosa a stern look. She shakes her head at you. "It means that if you don't acclimate to the University that you will soon find yourself a guinea pig for far more sinister experiments as per our agreement." If your eyes could throw knives at someone, they would have been throwing daggers at Rosa by this point. "You wouldn't." You reply to Rosa's remark. You are hoping to on high that she is bluffing. "I will if you don't cooperate missy." That title definitely did not sit well with you. "Besides, why would you want to? This body is clearly an upgrade from the one you previously had and we've got a bright future laid out for you too."

You raise an eyebrow at Rosa. "What do you mean, bright future?" The idea of bright future could mean several things at this point and very few of them were probably in your favor. "You did see the curriculum you signed up for, didn't you?" Rosa asks as she turns the folder towards you to show you. It says history and engineering physics. "Yeah, what about it?" You say to her. "Those are nothing special." A condescending smile now appears on Rosa's face. "Child, those are two of the most advanced studies we have here at King University. The subject of history is not just the study of history, but using space-time devices to correct or alter history. It is a very delicate and paradoxical burden that requires incredible amount of care and thought." She slides designs for what appears to be two wrist devices. "And engineering physics is applying scientific theory into practical use, all scientific theory. Like these devices that will be accompanying you on your journey through space and time."
11233211221.title: Door number one (Counselor's door)

choices: Tell Rosa where she can stick her schedule
112332112212.content:
"This is bullshit!" You say in defiantly to Rosa. "Am I supposed to build a hyperdrive by third period, travel through time to slay an evil dragon trying to take over Camelot, and still make it back in time to win the volleyball tournament to top it all off just so I can be a well rounded girl, right?" Your right hand instinctively goes up to make a stopping gesture when you say that last part to Rosa. You'd deal with the issues of that entire scenario later. "You're absolutely right," Rosa said with a bemused look on her face. While she says that she folds her hands together and props her elbows up on her desk to rest her chin upon. "There is no possible way that you are sitting here in front of me in a young, athletic woman's body." Rosa looks at you victoriously as she awaits your response. You open your mouth and raise a finger to make a point but you are rendered speechless by her argument.

Rosa's lip twitched into a victorious smile as she sat back to look down at your file. "Your psychological profile says that you have an alpha personality and all the faculties necessary to excel in everything you do. Or at least you think you do in any case. This explains your defiant and belligerent behavior. You clearly abhor the idea of not being in control of your own fate and most certainly will at some point try to create a way to out maneuver, out think, or overcome the University." She looks up at to gauge your response but you simply sit there in silence with a scowl upon your face. She was right in every regard but you weren't about to tip your hand. "But the fact of the matter remains that you have yet to do so and I suggest you play along. You'll soon discover that working with the University will be far more beneficial than it is to work against us."

You look away and sigh. "So what is it you expect me to do?" "Simple," Rosa began to say as she pulled out a schedule from your file. "I expect you to play your part as Alexis Lee without telling anyone you are special. Go to your assigned classes, participate in sports, and do what you do best; excel. Who knows, maybe if you act like you want to be here you will actually find yourself making friends and having fun." You take the schedule from Rosa's hand but have a burning question in your mind. "What is the point of me participating in sports or even this University even having a sports program?" The whole idea of sports in King's University seemed to be ridiculous and somewhat immoral. What would be the point of a sports program in a place where they give you a new body that the corporation creates for you? "You mean besides it being a way of maintaining a level of normalcy for students to participate in for stress relief, entertainment, and physical fitness?" She asks you, which you respond unpoetically with. "Uh, yeah." She chuckled at your naivety. "Because it is a great way to generate revenue to fund this place."

The 'Counselor' grabbed your file and headed towards the cabinet in her office. "Now unless you have any more questions I suggest you be on your way. Don't want the RAs to catch you out of uniform now do you?" Rosa says while she files your folder into its proper place. "The RAs?" You ask Rosa, confused by her remark. "Yes, they have the authority of the University." She says while walking over to desk with a smile on her face. "That means that if you are caught breaking the rules they have the authority of the University to exact punishment on you. That usually comes in the form of being volunteered for one of their experiments." The statement hung in the air as Rosa dropped that bomb on you. "Ta-ta!"
112332112212.title: "This is bullshit..."

choices: "Okay, just don't let it happen again..."
1123321122121.content:
You get up from your seat and head out the door. Once outside you see Maria who is hanging out lazily by the receptionist counter. Her brown eyes were starring off into nothingness until you close the door behind you. The sound shocks her out of her daydream and her face immediately brightens up. "So how did it go?" Maria asks as she walks over to. "Okay I guess," You say with a shrug as you show her your class schedule. "Looks like I've got a busy life ahead of me." You say in a less than enthusiastic voice. "Let me see that!" Maria said as she pulled the piece of paper out of your hands and started reading over your routine. "Whoa, you're in history and engineering physics, where are you going to find the time?!" She said amazed while you gave her another uninterested shrug. "Beats me, but its not like I have a choice." You say as you start walking towards the door.

"Are you kidding me?" Maria exclaims as she walks up to you. "This has got to be the heaviest course set I've seen so far! I mean, being a history major alone is huge. I know girls who would kill for that major. Its so selective that only one class exists in the University!" You raise an eyebrow at your roommate, suspicious of her enthusiasm. "Is that supposed to make me feel better?" You say bitterly as you make your way towards Smith's Annex. You were too focused on the fact that you were being blackmailed into this 'selective' major. Though it might not be considered blackmail due to the fact that you did sign your life away. Your mistake, but it didn't mean you had to like it. "Ch'ya!" The Puerto Rican girl responded as she caught up to walk next to you. "Do you not realize what you get to do with this major? You basically can explore the universe unhindered. You can literally meet Prince Charming." You roll your eyes at that remark with a smirk on your face. If nothing, your roommate was good at making you feel better. Even if you didn't want to admit it.

Walking up the concrete steps, you come to the front door and reach out for the door handle. You hear the very audible bolt switching from the locked position to the unlocked position. "How the heck does it know anyways?" You turn to Maria and ask while you place your hand on the door handle. "Facial recognition program." She says as she points up to a camera at the top of the door. "That is just creepy...Jeeze, what is this door made out of?" You complain as you struggle with opening the heavy door. The inanimate object was unexpectedly heavy even after you saw it kick Maria's butt earlier. "I know, right? Its a workout just to open it up!"

When the door finally opens up, you and your roommate cross the threshold into Smith's Annex. Behind the counter are two different Residential Advisers or RAs. One of them, an attractive looking black girl who has her hair pulled into a ponytail looks up at you. "Excuse me," She says loudly as she stands up and moves to head you and Maria off. "Just who are you and where do you think your going wearing that?" The girl says accusingly while placing her hands on her hips. You can't help but find it humorous that a girl who doesn't even come up to your chest is attempting to threaten you. "I'm Maria and this is my roommate Alexis." The Puerto Rican girl says before you have the chance to say anything. "I know she is out of uniform but she just arrived today and is getting settled in. In fact, she just saw her counselor." The RA looked up at you scrupulously before looking back at Maria. "Please let it go just this one time!" Maria pleaded with the girl.
1123321122121.title: Leave while you are behind

11233211221212.content:
"Rules are rules," The short RA says sternly as a bright flash of blue light appears from behind you. Immediately you feel yourself falling to the ground. Your instincts are to reach out and brace yourself before you impact but your arms and legs don't respond. They are locked out, paralyzed, by whatever that blue light was behind you. Unfortunately your senses were paralyzed too, otherwise you might have been spared the pain of smacking your face against the tile floor. You'd wince in pain but even your throat is prevented from moving. The only control you really had was the ability to move your eyes, and with your face against the ground, about the best you could do was see the second RA you didn't pay any attention to earlier. She was lowering a device that looked like one of the price guns used in retailing stores. She must have used that to paralyze you.

"What did you do that for?!" You could hear Maria exclaim in fright as a shadow looms over you. You look up to see the black RA kneeling down next to you. Well, really all you could see was her shoes, white socks, smooth legs, and up her skirt because of the way she was kneeling next to you. Navy blue panties. 'Probably to go with the school colors' You thought smugly to yourself. "You said it yourself," The black RA said over you. "We've got ourselves a first timer here. Don't want her trying anything stupid now do we?" There was a hint of sadistic pleasure in her voice. A moment later you feel her cold hand across your neck as she pulls your hair back. A moment later a syringe is stuck in your neck and you feel a cold sensation running throughout your body as the serum was being injected into your body.

"That should do it." The RA said as she removed the needle from your neck. You see her stand up and start walking behind you to where the second RA is. You hear the girl flip a switch, point the gun at you, and fire a bright pink beam at you this time. You can feel the control you are regaining over your limbs and slowly start moving to a sitting up position. Maria kneels down next to you to help you up. "W-What did you do to me?" You say meekly as you are still trying to shake off the paralysis.
11233211221212.title: "Rules are rules..."

choices: Maria tries to comfort you (Serum reduces part of you)
Maria tries to comfort you (Serum reduces all of you)
112332112212121.content:
"Reduction serum," The black RA said matter of factly while she placed the now empty syringe in an empty black carrying case. Meanwhile you can't help but become infuriated with how nonchalant she was being about the whole situation. "What the hell is that supposed to mean?" You demand from the girl. She was now busy ignoring you by zipping up the case and securing it behind the front desk. "Exactly as it sounds, it is supposed to reduce your size."

You manage to rise to your feet using your growing anger as a source of new found strength. "What do you mean reduce my size? Like all of me, permanently?!" You couldn't help your raising voice. It was enough to warrant a threatening look from the black RA while the other RA flicked a switch on her device before raising it against you. A slight sense of dread came over you as you saw that device aimed at you but it paled in comparison to your fury. This girl was getting the brunt of all the pent up rage you had for Rosa but were too afraid to express because of the ramifications. "You really expect me to sit here and take this?!" Your questioned lingered in the air, waiting to be answered, and it was the black RA who would give you that answer. She placed her hand over the device and forced her associate to lower the gun before taking several steps towards you. "I expect you to accept your punishment for breaking the rules like an adult. It is the only way you will ever learn from your mistakes and respect the rules." She was now standing a foot away from you. "Especially for someone in your position."

You couldn't help but give the RA a shocked but bewildered look. "What do you mean, my position?" Your words seeped with venom, challenging the RA to expose who you really are in front of Maria. You've only known her for about half an hour but you were sure that she was going to be your bedrock in this institution. She was the only kind person you met thus far and you really didn't want to explain to her that you used to be a guy right now.

"Someone set to be the next generation of RAs." The RA responded, granting you at least a sigh of relief. "You should know better." She pointed at you to emphasize her remark. You couldn't help but give the RA a look of defeat. Looking at things from her point of view, she was completely right. 'Wait, since when did I ever give a damn about what other people think? Oh yeah...' That thought only compounded the amount of self loathing you had for yourself right now and it must have been apparent on your face because of what the RA said next. "Come back in an hour," You looked up, or actually down, at her with a confused expression. "I'll examine the effect it has had on you and give you the counter-serum."

Silently you nod at the RA. "Right, experimental." You said in a defeated voice before turning around and heading towards the room. Maria looked like she wanted to say something but one look from you silenced her. So she quietly followed behind you, giving you the space you needed to let everything sink in at once. You used to be the average Joe but now you've somehow been transformed into a girl. Grant, you are a ridiculously hot girl, but that doesn't ease your mind at how permanent the situation is. Then you were blackmailed by the corporate thug Rosa into compliance while being forced to take some bizzaro classes. She has enforcers dressed up in Catholic school girl outfits hellbent on ensuring you are too among other school rules, lest they turn you into their personal pin cushions. And to top it all off, they know exactly how to give you a guilt trip while doing it.

The first thing you do when you walk into the room is kick off your heels and dive straight onto your bed. Maria closes the door behind her while you wrap your arms around your pillow. "I hate my life..." You say before bury your head in a pillow.
112332112212121.title: "Reduction Serum."

1123321122121212.content:
"Hey, its not all that bad," Maria says as she closes the door behind her to make sure the two of you have privacy. She walks over to 'your' bed to sit down next to you. "You are just having a rough start. We all go through it." You can fell her lay her hand upon your back to comfort you. Unfortuanately the last thing you wanted to be was comforted. "You don't understand," You snap back at her before pressing the pillow against your body even tighter. "I didn't ask for any of this!"

You let out a frustrated sigh as you throw your head into the pillow wishing for everything to just go away. You are particularly upset with the way you were behaving. Ever since you became a girl you began to act like one. Irrational thoughts dictated by emotion, not logic, filled your mind.

"I hate this body!" You say, popping your head up momentarily to look at Maria was gesturing to all of your body before burying your face once more into the pillow. "Come on now, you don't mean that." Maria says as she starts lightly caressing your back. "Girls would kill to have your body. You've just gotta get used to it." You scoff at the idea. "Get used to a freakishly tall body that has hit the gym one too many times, no thank you. Go ahead and let them have this body!" You knew you were being mellodramatic at this point and you hated yourself all the more for it. But Maria seemed to be right on cue and well experienced with this kind of emotional trauma. She immediately responded by teasing you to downplay your problems. "Well you won't be freakishly tall for long from what I'm told." You can't help but laugh at Maria's remark despite the horrid truth of the matter.

As if on cue, you begin to feel a chilling sensation start coursing through your body. It was almost as if you could feel the venemous serum start working on every fiber in your body while it spread. You weren't sure how long you had but you knew it was starting to take effect.

"That's not funny," You say to Maria as you prop yourself up with your elbow to look at her. She still had her hand on your shoulder and was looking at you with a warm smile and compassionate eyes. "Then why are you laughing?" You shake your head at Maria as you try to force back a smile, several loose strands of your hair falling in front of your face. "I must look like I mess." You say as you put both of your hands on your face to brush away all the hair and what threatened to be tears. "I think you look beatufiul." Maria says, shocking you so much that all you can do is stare at her while blinking away your watery eyes. You weren't sure what to think of what she was saying while she was caressing you so affectionately and tenderly. "R-really?" You ask in a chocked voice. Maria leans in close to you where your face barely inches away. "Really." She says with a sultry voice as she looks at you with her soft, brown eyes. You hesitate as your green eyes searches hers, uncertain of what Maria intends. She moves slowly to lean in and kiss you, affording you the opportunity to remove yourself from the situation if you want. In this moment you realize that she was the closest thing to a friend out here in this strange new world and you wanted to be with her. No, you needed to be with her.

Trembling, you lean in to kiss Maria back. Your kiss was unsure at first but soon becomes empassioned as Maria affectionately kisses you back. She starts to press against you to force you onto your back while she straddles your hips. Meanwhile she interlocks both of her hands with yours and pin them above your head while she passionately kisses you. You feel yourself getting lost in the moment as Maria starts gyrating her hips against hers and you even let a slight gasp escape from your lips as she does so skillfully. It is hard to describe how excited you were getting. Suddenly your entire body felt like it was on fire. Your cheeks were flushed, your nipples hard and sensitive, and even thought Maria wasn't grinding up against it, yet, you could feel yourself getting stimulated and wet.

Unfortunately the terrible serum sensation remained. You felt a sinking feeling in your gutt and you couldn't help but notice the tight clothes loosen while Maria seemed to be getting heavier...
1123321122121212.title: Maria tries to comfort you (Serum reduces all o...

11233212.content:
This is too much for you. “I’m out of here,” you say, turning away from the mirror and stalking towards the door. You open the door and step out into a hallway, then turn and start walking. You don’t care that you’re wearing only the tank top and sweatpants - and no shoes - nor do you know or care where you’re going. You just need to get out. At the end of the hall is a windowed door to a stairwell, but before you can get there something takes hold of your wrist from behind. You stop and turn to see Maria, with an odd look on her face. Resigned, annoyed, and sympathetic all at the same time.

“You shouldn’t run off,” she says sternly, in a notable change from her previous cheerful demeanor. “I know it’s a shock but it’s something we all go through. We all have to acclimate.”

“But I can’t just-“ you cut yourself off before you accidentally give away that you weren’t a girl before.

Maria looks around, making sure you’re alone. “We’re not allowed to talk about who we were before,” she says in a near-whisper. “It doesn’t matter. Do you understand?”
11233212.title: "I'm out of here!"

112332123.content:
“But I’m not really a girl,” you protest, before flinching back. You hadn’t meant to say that.

“Quiet!” Maria hisses. “Of course you’re a girl.” She looks around again. “Look, it doesn’t matter who you were before, or why.”

“Rosa only showed me girl profiles-“ you start to say in a whisper, but Maria cuts you off.

“Doesn’t matter,” she repeats. “You are who you are now, and you always were. If you reject who you are, it goes badly. But if you accept, it’s a lot better. Understand?”

“Can I be a lesbian at least?” you squeak, wishing to avoid the part of girlhood you most dread.

“If you accept who you are? Yes, you can, definitely. Understand?”

You take a deep breath and sigh. “I understand,” you say.

Maria brightens. “So, what’s your name?” she asks again.

You pause for a moment before responding. “Alexis Lee.”

“Good,” Maria says happily, her previous cheer retuning fully. “Come back to the room,” she tugs your hand and you follow as she pulls you along, “and your acclimation can begin.”

“What do you mean?” you ask, but Maria doesn’t respond until you’re back in the room.

“You need to fully understand who you are,” she says. “Your body comes with things like muscle memory so you’re not stumbling around and can handle any athletics. And your brain can learn quickly so you can handle your classes - this is a college more than anything else. But you need to know yourself, and never make mistakes. You are who you are, and nothing else. That’s acclimation. I’ll be helping you through the process so you’ll be fully acclimated before term begins in a week. Then, since you’re in the accelerated academics program, you’ll have the option to upgrade to a single dorm if you want.”

“A week?” You ask. “I have to get used this in a week?”

“It’ll be fine as long as you accept it,” Maria says. “Now, start by getting dressed, and I’ll show you around campus.”
112332123.title: “But I’m not really a girl”

choices: A couple of students approach you... Male students?!?
Maria emerges, takes your arm and starts the tour.
Maria is agitated, and insists you answer to Alexis Lee, from now on.
You suggest starting in the café, wanting a public place.
1123321231.content:
Alexis bit back the other questions that struggled to the surface. Keeping them for later, for once they're in public. She could press for answers with the risk of exposure that Maria seemed to fear.

Turning to the wardrobe, you open it. Eager to get dressed and out there and your questions answered.

But the wardrobe is intimidating. It's filled with womens' clothes, and you scowl down at your full bust. Knowing you'll fit them now.

Worse, you feel an intrinsic knowledge of how to wear them. How to get dressed, and how they'll flatter you. They are all far too silky smooth, and traditional. You realise they want Alexis... They want you to embrace the standard Asian values of refinement and grace.

Catching your reflection in the mirror inside the door. You stick your tongue out at the reflection, just wishing you looked older. Your face just looks too young for your body. If only your body didn't look so... mature.

"Ao Dai", the word surfaces from that scary base you can't recognise. Your imprinted knowledge, not wanting to antagonise Maria, you swallow your discomfort and get dressed.

Making it outside, you sit on a stone ledge, waiting for Maria to catch up.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/ea/b7/e8/...
1123321231.title: Get dressed on your own

choices: It's filled with herds of animals: Horses; cows; and so forth.
Your eyes go wide in horror, as you see into the compound below.
The compound is filled with vacuous bimbos.
You see a crowd of über-busty women.
11233212312.content:
Maria takes your arm. Her hand locking tightly around your upper arm. It's not a friendly hold, as she walks you around the building. You barrage her with questions. Trying to get louder, and overheard. Trying to scare an answer out of her.

"Alexis... shut up!" she finally snaps.

"My name's not..." she smothers the next word, as she kisses you. Pressing you against the wall. The sensation of her bust pressing into you is erotic, but feeling your own bust smoosh against hers less so. You also aren't sure how you feel about her being in charge. And she is definitely in charge.

Breaking apart, she silences you with a glare. Daring you to ask another question. Threatening with a look for you to complete that denial. You silently mouth the word 'Alexis', and she shakes her head once more.

"I've something to show you, and then... then you can ask your questions, then you can shout your denials from the rooftops." She said in a hurried whisper. She had you pulled back into a quick walk as you still piece together what she's said.

Finally, you take it on board. Allowing yourself to walk beside her rather than stumbling along, with her leading you by the arm.

"There's a certain fate for failed experiments." She explains in a rasping whisper. "If they feel Alexis isn't integrating properly, or at worst denying her present, and exclaiming her past... You get reprocessed."

You plant your feet as best you can. Breaking free, you stumble backwards only a lamp-post stops you falling on your ass.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/5a/95/6a/...

"I want to be reprocessed." you insist. Only Maria's warning keep your voice low.

"No, you don't. Not like this!" she insisted. "We're almost there."

Holding a finger to her lips, she signals for you to be silent. She walks quietly towards the edge of the building. She disappears into the shadowy undergrowth, where the plants grow against the wall of the building.

The urge to call a question after her dies in your throat, even before she was swallowed by the shade.

You follow her, until you too vanish into the dark undergrowth. You make out Maria's back ahead of you, and putting a hand on her shoulder continue the journey.

Maria stops, and pressing her mouth against your hair. "This is where those who don't adapt end up." Her whisper warms your ear, and ruffles your hair. But she continues on. Taking you to a view overlooking a high-walled compound.
11233212312.title: Maria emerges, takes your arm and starts the tour.

choices: You freeze, as a branch snaps loudly beneath your feet.
Down the path, you hear a branch snap, and hunt for an escape.
"How do you know?" you ask Maria's back, "How can you be so sure?!"
112332123121.content:
It's Maria's hand covering your mouth that stops your exasperated gasp. Surely she doesn't think this is the fate of those who haven't adjusted to their... to your new bodies.

As she uncovers your mouth, she directs your attention to a particular horse. You can't see anything special about it, but you've followed her so far. You crouch quietly, hoping you don't have to wait too long before you can leave this dingbat behind.

The horse appears to be choking, or coughing... It's hard to be sure. But, it's whinnies sound strained and almost painful.

"Am... Amnd..." you strain your ears, unsure if you're imagining human speech from such a different throat.

"Amnda" it whinnies, "Rd..rdrg.." she tosses her mane in frustration.

As you reach your guess, Maria is whispering the confirmation into your ears. "That was the previous Amanda Rodriguez."

A shudder ran down your spine. "She protested her current life, and she demanded to be reassessed." She looked at you sternly. "You don't get the same options a second time around."

Shaking your head in denial, you try to fight the conclusion you've reached yourself.

"Pr..css me..." a strained whinny bursts from her lips, as she tosses her mane.

"An equine brain isn't made to hold a human consciousness." She tells you.

"And that throat isn't made for human speech." A tear welled up in the corner of her eye. "After a couple of days they stop talking... I don't know if it's too painful to speak, or their humanity is absorbed by their animal nature... But that could be you, if you protest."

You gesture that you want to leave, "I hope she's lost her humanity." Maria adds. "I've heard the stable hands talking. They're sent to the stud ranch. Broken to a particular stallion's harem, and spend the rest of their lives as brood mares."

She spared a last look to the former Amanda Rodriguez, before heading back along the way you came.
112332123121.title: It's filled with a herd of horses.

choices: You still throw up, loudly before you get too far.
As you leave, you hear the sound of a pump starting, and a rhythmic moan begin.
A twig snaps loudly beneath your unsteady feet.
You see a silhouette at the entrance/exit to the secret passage.
112332123124.content:
"You might feel busty now." Maria hissed. "It's an adjustment, going from male to female. They all feel too large at first."

Stepping aside, she let you see into the walled compound.

"But that's your fate if you protest."

She jabs her finger, unnecessarily towards one woman.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/86/c6/ef/...

Again, she jabs at another over endowed woman.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/6a/64/df/...

She presses close to you, ready to whisper.

"I think she was Rebecca Reeve." she said singling out another girl.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/f3/fc/da/...

She looked lost, as she leaned against the wall of the housing block. A forlorn look to the wall. Merely 8' high, but with those bodies far to high to climb. She shook her head, as she pointed to the next girl.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/24/f4/bf/...

"That was Janet Jensen. But she objected to being so short."

She shuddered, "She's still the same height, but now her hormones rule her... Keep her docile."

She stared deep into your eyes. "That's what happens just from time alone. I've heard moaning from the main building." She nodded towards it, "I think they're being milked... and I've seen some of the handlers... They treat them like cattle."

Twisted as she was, the shrug was hard to see, "Human cattle they can fuck." she said. "The girls don't seem to mind."

Your face going green, couldn't help but imagine being even more endowed... feeling even more out of control. This body felt alien enough, its' instincts and urges hard to control. But you recognise the queasy sensation. You know that you're going to throw up.

Maria nods back down the track, for you both to retreat from the close examination of that horrifying horde of women.
112332123124.title: You see a crowd of über-busty women.

1123321232.content:
You nod, and Maria gestures to a wardrobe near the bed you woke up on. “That’s yours,” she says. You thank her and open it.

Alexis -you- have a variety of clothing. There are several dresses and skirts, but also a slightly lower number of pants and shorts, in addition to various types of shirts. “Uh, a little help?” you ask weakly. Maria walks over to you, smiling gently. You open the underwear drawer, and are relieved to find that the vast majority of your underwear is simple and plain, and select a plain white bra and matching panties.

You strip naked and put your clothes in the hamper that Maria points out. You catch another glimpse of yourself in the mirror, but turn away, deliberately not thinking about how very attractive your new body is, and ignoring Maria’s grin. You get dressed, starting with the panties. The bra is a bit weird at first but you manage once Maria tells you what to do, likely the muscle memory she mentioned.

Maria starts looking through your closet, occasionally pausing to look at something. After a couple minutes Maria brings out two dresses, one shin-length and brick-red with no sleeves, and one thigh-length and sea-blue with short sleeves. Both, fortunately, are fairly modest, and you select the blue one. You put the dress on relatively simply, treating it as an extra-long shirt. Maria then advises you to add shorts under the dress, which you are happy to do with black jean shorts.

“Wow, you look great!” Maria says once you’re done, grinning widely. “Super hot. I bet you’d look great in anything. You won’t have any problem getting a girlfriend.” You smile sheepishly, and she chuckles and calms down. She gestures at a makeup kit on a table near her bed. “You want some?’

“No!” you say firmly, then think of something and switch to a more ‘in-character’ response. “I mean, er, I don’t ever use makeup.” Indeed, there is no such kit on your side of the room.

Maria nods. “Heels?” You shake your head, taking a pair of sneakers from your wardrobe, and she shrugs, looking at your wardrobe and seeing only flat shoes (just the sneakers and a pair of formal flats). “Well, it’s not like you need to be taller.” You smirk at that. You’re a lot taller now than you were before, and you like that much, at least. You put the sneakers on while Maria puts her own shoes on. She is wearing low heels, but even with them she is still shorter than you.

Maria takes your hand and leads you back into the hallway and towards the stairwell. The two of you head down the stairwell to the ground floor (your room is located on the third floor) and exit into a wide-open lobby. Several girls are here, relaxing, reading, or talking with each other. Maria waves to them as you pass by but does not stop, instead leading you out the front door.

“Well, Alexis, shall I start the tour?”
1123321232.title: Ask Maria for advice

1123322.content: When you wake up you feel very refreshed, with energy, you feel very different, as your body is female, looking at the clock you see it's 4:30, you get up and get ready on autopilot, workout in the gym, your body is in better shape, as your toned body, gets ready, doing a quick brush through, then tying to a ponytail, shoulder length with pageboy bangs. A quick look to make sure you don't forget anything, at the gym, looking around, you go to the uneven bars, stretching, then doing your workout your mind is actually working better, you speak three languages, English, spanish and french. A straight A student, you party, but know when to chill, as others show up you notice that cute blond Carla is watching you, your attracted to her as well, when you finished, she comes up to you and gives you her number, you will most likely call her, for a date.
1123322.title: Amanda Rodriguez

choices: I think we mentioned that KARC allowed time for you to adapt.
Screw it. You want a solution NOW!
I think i'll just go home.
113.content:
When Rosa comes back, you are quick to inform her of your decision.

"Excellent! Just sign at the bottom here..."

She hands you 5 papers. The first one: Additional monetary compensation in accordance with section 12(35)b in event of unanticipated prolonged or permanent effects...

Not a word of this goes into your head. You just quickly sign them and hand them all to Rosa.

"Alright, just come over here."

"Over here" seems to refer to going somewhere near to the top of the building in an elevator. You walk down the corridor, and arrive in a stainless steel room, in the middle of which lies some machine with two seats on it. On these seats lie two dome-shaped metal thingies with wires and electrodes poking out all over. The only other thing in the room is what looks like their high-tech version of a desktop computer.

Rosa directs you to sit down on one of the seats, marked "1" and to put on the weird hat. You feel a sharp pain, seemingly from all over your body. You try to struggle, but you seem to be limp, paralysed.

"Now, just sit here until the next test subject arrives."
